verses.verse: <S%H3884>If<s%> it had not been <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who was on our <S%H3478>side,<s%> let Israel now <S%H559>say,<s%>
<S%H3884>if<s%> it had not been <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who was on our <S%H120>side,<s%> when men rose up against <S%H6965>us;<s%>
<S%H233>then<s%> they would have swallowed us <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> when their <S%H639>wrath<s%> was kindled against <S%H2734>us;<s%>
<S%H233>then<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> would have <S%H7857>overwhelmed<s%> <S%H5158>us,<s%> the stream would have gone <S%H5674>over<s%> our <S%H5315>soul;<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who has not <S%H5414>given<s%> us as a <S%H2964>prey<s%> to their <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>

Our <S%H5315>soul<s%> has <S%H4422>escaped<s%> like a <S%H6833>bird<s%> out of the <S%H3369>fowler<s%>'s <S%H6341>snare.<s%> The <S%H6341>snare<s%> is <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and we have <S%H4422>escaped.<s%>
Our <S%H5828>help<s%> is in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>
